message.content: {"name":"4-tygodniowy PPL na masę","description":"Program Push-Pull-Legs z progresywnym obciążeniem zaprojektowany na hipertrofię. Każdy cykl zwiększa intensywność.","cycle_duration_weeks":4,"schedule":[{"name":"Push A","exercises":[{"name":"wyciskanie sztangi na ławce poziomej","sets":[{"reps":8,"weight":80,"rest_seconds":150,"rir":2},{"reps":8,"weight":80,"rest_seconds":150,"rir":2},{"reps":8,"weight":80,"rest_seconds":150,"rir":2}],"notes":"Łokcie 45 stopni, pełen zakres ruchu"},{"name":"wyciskanie hantli na ławce skośnej","sets":[{"reps":10,"weight":30,"rest_seconds":120,"rir":2},{"reps":10,"weight":30,"rest_seconds":120,"rir":2},{"reps":10,"weight":30,"rest_seconds":120,"rir":2}],"notes":"Kontrolowane opuszczanie"}]},{"name":"Pull A","exercises":[{"name":"podciąganie na drążku","sets":[{"reps":8,"rest_seconds":180,"rir":1},{"reps":8,"rest_seconds":180,"rir":1},{"reps":8,"rest_seconds":180,"rir":1}],"notes":"Pełny zakres ruchu"},{"name":"wiosłowanie sztangą","sets":[{"reps":8,"weight":60,"rest_seconds":150,"rir":2},{"reps":8,"weight":60,"rest_seconds":150,"rir":2},{"reps":8,"weight":60,"rest_seconds":150,"rir":2}]}]},{"name":"Legs A","exercises":[{"name":"przysiad ze sztangą","sets":[{"reps":8,"weight":100,"rest_seconds":180,"rir":2},{"reps":8,"weight":100,"rest_seconds":180,"rir":2},{"reps":8,"weight":100,"rest_seconds":180,"rir":2}],"notes":"Głęboki przysiad"},{"name":"wykroki z hantlami","sets":[{"reps":12,"weight":20,"rest_seconds":120,"rir":2},{"reps":12,"weight":20,"rest_seconds":120,"rir":2}]}]}]}
